A powerful warrior from a land of plenty, whose bravery has been acknowledged and for which they may wear the Saurian Crown.
It is said that the warriors of the Collective of Plenty like to deal powerful strikes while dashing at their foes — a lesson learned from the Tatankasaurs who share their lands. This is especially true for those warriors who wield heavy weapons, and claim the secret to a successful blow is to swing from the hips.

55112.Name: Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser
Title: Tatankasaurus Warrior: Spiritlight Chaser
Bravery Saurian-Crowned
55112.Desc:
A powerful warrior from a land of plenty, whose bravery has been acknowledged and for which they may wear the Saurian Crown.
Among the Collective of Plenty, even those warriors who have painstakingly trained to use long-range weapons are known to be skilled in hand-to-hand combat. Perhaps, to them, ranged weapons are better for bludgeoning than firing projectiles.

62501.Name: Tatankasaur Whelp
Title: Tatankasaur Whelp
Ranging Saurians of Natlan
62501.Desc:
A young Tatankasaurus that has not yet mastered full control of its powerful frame, leaving its movements clumsy.
Its second set of horns are still growing out, and its back and snout are not quite strong enough to smash through rocks that block the road. Given the time to grow, it will one day be able to roam freely across the fertile plains.

62502.Name: Tatankasaurus
Title: Tatankasaurus
Ranging Saurians of Natlan
62502.Desc:
A saurian with a hard, bony crest and a powerful body suited to dashing around volcanic landscapes.
According to legend, the Tatankasaurus's ancestors were so large they could use their horns to move mountains, but they lacked the agility of their smaller, modern relatives. Perhaps the great power that Tatankasaurs still possess is a gift passed down through their bloodline.

62503.Name: The Peak
Title: Mutant Species That Fell into the Volcano

62611.Name: Thundering Wayob Manifestation
Title: Thundering Wayob Manifestation
Envoy of Night and Wandering Spirits
62611.Desc:
The Collective of Plenty believe in and worship the Wayob, which manifests upon the land with the power of totems and Nightsouls.
According to tribal legend, the Wayob has taken on countless forms. In the dim, pre-dawn darkness, where faces were hidden in shadows, the Wayob would wrestle with the mightiest tribal warriors, with neither side prevailing. The Collective of Plenty believe their Wayob has the power to control thunder and speed, and can bestow abundant harvests upon the land.

62612.Name: "Tupu's Lushness"
Title: Vessel for the Will to Grow

62703.Name: Lava Dragon Statue
Title: Lava Dragon Statue
Stone-Hearted Final Form of Flowing Flame
62703.Desc:
A monster that can continuously generate heat to sustain its activities.
Legends say these monsters with lava at their cores are the products of a distinct line of research to the Source Mechanisms that followed them — research into whether the primal flame could be used to create a new race based on humans. This research undoubtedly failed, for once the reaver arrived with their throne from beyond the skies, all that the primal flame could birth were hollow shells whose nominal lifeforce granted them no more consciousness than a stone.

62704.Name: "Infinitesimal"
Title: A Fiery Stone Gathers No Moss

62901.Name: Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel
Title: Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel
Hunter of the Ancient Sacred Mountain
62901.Desc:
An ancient variant of mountain weasel that has adapted to a unique, Phlogiston-rich environment isolated from the outside world.
By consuming creatures rich in Phlogiston, this species accumulates power in the shell it holds. After a prolonged existence in the ruins of the Sacred Mountain, its affinity for Phlogiston seems to have caused it to be influenced by the Source Mechanisms within the ruins, creating a unique symbiotic relationship between them.

80310.Name: "Ironclaw"
Title: Apex Bird of the Iron Hills

80228.Name: "Battlegoat"
Title: Brute Knight of the Iron Hills

91220.Name: The Game Before the Gate
Title: Not the One Who Plays at "Chess Games"
91220.Desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

40905.Name: Secret Source Automaton: Overseer Device
Title: Secret Source Automaton: Overseer Device
Ancient Ruins Master Terminal
40905.Desc:
A domination mechanism from the ancient ruins.
In ancient times, to oversee the operation of their mega-cities, a mighty race vested part of their power into a form of phlogiston-engineered intelligence. Driven by their mission, and by means of various other mechanisms, the machines upon which it was bestowed once controlled the functioning of myriad cities across the land. Now, long after their ancient civilization's fall through wars with an emerging race, these once-wise contraptions retain only the most basic of commands.

91201.Name: Chess Game: King Piece
Title: Not the One Who Plays at "Chess Games"
91201.Desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

91202.Name: Chess Game: Queen Piece
Title: Not the One Who Plays at "Chess Games"
91202.Desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

91211.Name: Ascended King
Title: Not the One Who Plays at "Chess Games"
91211.Desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

91212.Name: Sublimated Queen
Title: Not the One Who Plays at "Chess Games"
91212.Desc:
A soldier-entity born into being through the skills of various members of the Hexenzirkel.
Although their technological underpinnings are far from abstruse, and touch not upon the profound wisdom at the universe's core, yet as guards of the gate's final threshold, they are a metaphor in and of themselves.
This world may be governed by rules, but for those who manage to cross its verge, such constraints no longer apply.

20051205.Name: Hydro Tulpa: Turbulent Vortex
Title: Awakened Egregore
20051205.Desc:
A humanoid monster formed from the agglomeration of water.
Countless wills dissolved in the water, which, like the universe, was full of souls that wished to be born.
Suffering and hatred, suffused into those waters, intersected to warp what was once human shape amidst the inchoate chaos of the Ley Lines. The tragic dissolution is soon to repeat itself...

26270305.Name: Lava Dragon Statue: Blazing Flame
Title: Stone-Hearted Final Form of Flowing Flame
26270305.Desc:
A monster that can continuously generate heat to sustain its activities.
A failed attempt to birth wisdom from pure energy that bears the outline of a great race yet possesses no more consciousness than a stone.
Though this being was once no different from a corpse, the Ley Lines in turmoil have imparted the virulent animus of the deceased upon it, adding thoughts fell and perilous to its instinct for battle.

24090504.Name: Secret Source Automaton: Overseer Device - Obliterator Panoply
Title: Ancient Ruins Master Terminal
24090504.Desc:
A domination mechanism from the ancient ruins.
In the distant past, a once-mighty ancient race used this mechanism to oversee the operation of their cities. Even now, long after the fall of their civilization, it still retains immense authority.
In the depths of the chaotic Ley Lines, the core energy module that deteriorated over the lengthening years has been restored, indeed, even "overclocked" to a dangerous degree. This machine is now unchained by its original specifications, capable of freeing itself from the planet's shackles and using its horrific "Obliterator Panoply"...

22121604.Name: Tenebrous Papilla: Shadow Void Transfiguration
Title: Void Fantasy Plant
22121604.Desc:
Abyssal monsters that grow like parasitic plants.
Agents of continuous corrosion, these distorters are capable of extracting memories from deeper layers of the earth, and through the power of the Abyss, reconstructing memories of greater potency. The hatred once spread from their roots coalesced amidst the inchoate chaos of the Ley Lines to form blades of untold savagery that would inflict deep suffering on those foolhardy enough to challenge them...

28021305.Name: Battle-Hardened Tent Tortoise: Thunderous Aegis
Title: Spirit of Cloud and Thunder
28021305.Desc:
Gentle and slow by nature, this reptile is seen by some as a symbol of wisdom and good fortune. Yet when backed into a corner, this remarkable creature is capable of unleashing fierce assaults upon its foes, using its thick shell as a battering ram to crush any and all opposition.
Amidst the inchoate chaos of the Ley Lines, its form has been twisted, eagerly charging into battle in a fury, like a lightning storm of attack and defense...

25560206.Name: Battle-Hardened Pipilpan Idol: Hundred Deceptions
Title: Gentle Yet Unyielding Resolve
25560206.Desc:
A Pipilpan Idol who channels the essence of Tenoch. Adept at dazzling hat tricks and stratagems of battle, it can attack from a wide range of angles, leaving reckless challengers paying the price for hasty missteps...
Amidst the inchoate chaos of the Ley Lines, the performer's obsession takes form as flurries of rejection and annihilation. Any slight mistake may result in the challenger being ground into dust, just as Tenoch's opponents once were...

801.Name: Gleaming Charge: Frostnight Scion
Title: Frostnight Scion
801.Desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Electro, resulting in its present form.
One of the manifestations with the most violent temperament, it commands steel-shattering bolts of lightning like mere servants, such that any land it passes through shall be marked as if by a marauding, thunderous calamity.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

802.Name: Tangled Vines: Frostnight Scion
Title: Frostnight Scion
802.Desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Dendro, resulting in its present form.
This entity has a marvelous resonance with the plant life of the groves. Some say that one of the Moonchanters once made a contract with the wooded lands with their help, thus becoming a friend and companion to all life on this land.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

803.Name: Blazing Brilliance: Frostnight Scion
Title: Frostnight Scion
803.Desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Pyro, resulting in its present form.
One of the manifestations with the most violent temperament, even at the frigid edges of the world, it is wreathed in unquenchable flame.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

804.Name: Icy Crystal: Frostnight Scion
Title: Frostnight Scion
804.Desc:
An elegant elemental life form that possesses immense elemental affinity. The long years have exposed it to high concentrations of Cryo, resulting in its present form.
It is said that this entity is closest to the original form of a Frostnight Scion. It will use icy mists and crystals to set up redoubtable walls, but perhaps it does this only to separate the flawless primeval light from the world that lies beneath the moon.
In still-extant prayers of the far north, it was born from the Frost Moon's blessings, symbolizing the pure source and the first radiance. Perhaps this is why it finds the tainting of its pale purity with the seven colors of heavenly light unbearable, thus rejecting all life that draws too close.

21300.Name: Wilderness Exile
Title: Shadow of the Wild Hunt
Wilderness Exile
21300.Desc:
A ghoul that stalks the frozen wilderness when the pitch-dark mist rolls in. Their emergence presages worse calamities to come.
All who dwell beneath the moon set out on journeys with their own goals and wishes in mind, but not all such wishes receive favor. Spirits that cannot rest due to engendered resentment, partings with loved ones, or desires that go unfulfilled, if corrupted by the Abyss, may transform into ghouls, forever lost in the thick mists of the Wild Hunt.

21310.Name: Wilderness Hunter
Title: Shadow of the Wild Hunt
Wilderness Hunter
21310.Desc:
A ghoul that stalks the frozen wilderness when the pitch-dark mist rolls in. Their emergence presages worse calamities to come.
Many great champions of a lost ancient kingdom lie buried beneath the frozen northlands. Though the remnants of the past have been long wiped clean, these noble spirits yet defend their golden homeland. Awakened by Abyssal taint, these warriors now see all who trespass as prey.

213200.Name: Sigurd
Title: The One Who Swore to Hunt the Hunt
213200.Desc: A valiant warrior who resisted the dark calamity in ancient days. Though his life's spark has been extinguished, his unbending will has yet to fade, and those who swore to become hunters of the Wild Hunt continue his endless battle even today. The dark abyss's corrosion has seeped into his marrow, causing him to lose his way, but the desire to defend hearth and home will surely reignite, reawakening him to continue a bitter, eternal battle.

21320.Name: Battle-Hardened Lightkeeper
Title: The Eternal Hunter
21320.Desc: A valiant warrior who resisted the dark calamity in ancient days. Though his life's spark has been extinguished, his unbending will has yet to fade, and those who swore to become hunters of the Wild Hunt continue his endless battle even today. The dark abyss's corrosion has seeped into his marrow, causing him to lose his way, but the desire to defend hearth and home will surely reignite, reawakening him to continue a bitter, eternal battle.

41001.Name: Knuckle Duckle
Title: Creator's Pride
Knuckle Duckle
41001.Desc:
A kuuvahki mechanism of peculiar make, made from scrap metal and mechanical bearings, that bears a partial resemblance — as per its creator's proclivities, apparently — to a "duck."
Its output and resistance to damage are comparable to the Fatui's most cutting-edge warfighting weaponry... But even so, it remains simply a toy duck that can punch its opponents very, very hard. A creator's preferences will always do much to determine a creation's appearance, as clay lacks the authority to question its creator's choice of molds. The world beneath the moon has long been sculpted into a form that people take for granted, but in the eyes of its original inhabitants, that form must surely be like a peculiar duck, shaped by its creator's bizarre predilections.
Of course, the blue-haired maid would never say any such thing to the mistress of the Krumkake Craftshop — after all, ducks are adorable, especially compared to the world's present aspect.

30701.Name: Oprichniki Line Trooper
Title: Oprichniki
Line Trooper
30701.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a gunblade and tasked to hold the line as the resilient backbone of the Oprichniki forces.
According to Snezhnayan infantry manuals, the primary duties of line troops are merely to aim, shoot, and charge. Even should the individual soldier's combat power not prove exceptional, soldiers of the line in tight formation remain a key foundation of the Snezhnayan military machine.

30721.Name: Oprichniki Support Trooper
Title: Oprichniki
Vanguard
30721.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a heavy shield and tasked to fight at the very front to protect their comrades.
Many understand that in the long war between Snezhnaya and the dark calamity, only the side that holds out with greater resolution can outlast the other and emerge victorious. The ultimate resolution of the Oprichniki is, undoubtedly, the shield that protects their forces — so long as this shield does not fall, there is always hope for victory.

30731.Name: Oprichniki Grenadier
Title: Oprichniki
Support Trooper
30731.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a man-portable grenade launcher that can perform close-range bombardment.
Though the Oprichniki has large-scale, fully-functional fire support attachments, the commanding staff still advocates for large numbers of grenadiers to be maintained. After all, no big gun can compare in surety at the very front lines of combat to a grenade launcher you can direct at will.

30741.Name: Oprichniki Vanguard
Title: Oprichniki
Medic
30741.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with engineering tools and highly adept in close-range combat.
To meet the demands of battlefield operations, the Fatui Oprichniki established vanguard units, tasked with clearing the path of obstacles for advancing forces. As for exactly what counts as an obstacle, that hardly matters. Be it an impassable ravine or a formidable foe standing in their way, they will remove it without hesitation — whatever it takes to ensure the banner of the Pale Star marches on.

30761.Name: Oprichniki Medic
Title: Oprichniki
Grenadier
30761.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a staff-like device and tasked with providing emergency medical support to their comrades in arms.
In truth, these medics have largely only taken crash-course training, and as such, their healing abilities are limited. In practice, they tend to adopt more efficient methods of supporting their allies — mixing in with the different units and charging at the enemy lines.

30781.Name: Oprichniki Bombardier
Title: Oprichniki
Bombardier
30781.Desc:
A soldier of the Fatui Oprichniki, equipped with a specialized hover pack and explosive charges, and tasked with performing breaching operations.
As troops with immense breakthrough potential, bombardiers are often sent to the most dire of battlefields, making them the troops who gain meritorious promotions most quickly. It is said that Oprichniki officers overwhelmingly come from the ranks of the bombardiers.

30791.Name: Oprichniki Fireblade Shock Trooper
Title: Battle-Hardened Fireblade Shock Trooper
30791.Desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who specializes in close combat using a giant blade.
Whether it be in the war against the dark calamity or against those ignoramuses who dare stand against the Tsaritsa's ideals, those who breach at the tip of the spear suffer the greatest casualties. As such, those who survive multiple battles are naturally the elite of the elite. There will always be those willing to become the fire and sword of the empire, just as there will always be those who chafe against the injustice of fate and the inequity of the Old World.

307911.Name: Battle-Hardened Fireblade Shock Trooper
Title: Molten Iron, Thundering Edge
307911.Desc: Employed at the titanic Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau, Poruchik Raskolnikov fulfills his role as a cog in the machine perfectly, executing every order without question, and doing his duty in silence and with precision.

307910.Name: Raskolnikov
Title: Poruchik
307910.Desc: Employed at the titanic Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau, Poruchik Raskolnikov fulfills his role as a cog in the machine perfectly, executing every order without question, and doing his duty in silence and with precision.

30792.Name: Oprichniki Hailstorm Cannoneer
Title: Oprichniki
Hailstorm Cannoneer
30792.Desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who uses a heavy cannon to tear enemy formations apart while using a mighty shield to defend their comrades.
Bitter battles have dyed the shield frost white, while coatings of blood have tinted its edges black. Oprichniki officers know that empty words will never bring back those who have fallen in sacrifice — only a bombardment akin to a hailstorm can shake this defiled Old World.

30793.Name: Oprichniki Thunderblitz Gvardiya
Title: Oprichniki
Thunderblitz Gvardiya
30793.Desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who specializes in using twin guns in combat.
Unlike their Skirmisher cousins, Oprichniki officers almost all hail from the Snezhnaya Royal Military Academy, whether due to the privilege of noble birth or the rare talent to escape a common background. After all, neither is truly different from the other within the Tsaritsa's beneficent, loving ideals. Traditionally, only fae could become elite Gvardiya, but today, this glorious role and title has been given to Oprichniki officers — a more equal division for the construction of a new world.

30801.Name: Close Combat Storm Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Close Combat Storm
30801.Desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
Equipped with Crawler Track Movement Mechanisms, these Landcruisers are normally used to storm enemy positions, where they can pass over rough terrain such as mud and melting snow despite heavy armor and armaments through their excellent load-bearing capabilities and off-road mobility. When close-combat Landcruisers approach enemy defensive lines in formation, rotating blades raised for battle, most foes will concentrate fire on them, allowing other units the opportunity to unleash their firepower...

30802.Name: Close Combat Scout Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Close Combat Scout
30802.Desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
These walking Landcruisers with bipedal structures are often used as "scouts," for they are able to quickly traverse rough terrain and reach key positions to seize the initiative for their allies. Their close-combat-oriented rotating blades allow them to deal fatal damage to their foes and shred shrubbery and obstacles to open the way, allowing units to operate with ease even amidst thick vegetation.

30803.Name: Force Recon Storm Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Force Recon Storm
30803.Desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
Equipped with Crawler Track Movement Mechanisms, these Landcruisers are normally used to storm enemy positions, where they can pass over rough terrain such as mud and melting snow despite heavy armor and armaments through their excellent load-bearing capabilities and off-road mobility. Force Recon armaments include a multi-barrel automatic gun, allowing this Landcruiser to adjust its tactics to both close quarters and long-range combat. Whether it be long-range observation or obtaining enemy intel in the midst of fearsome firefights, this Landcruiser model is more than up to the task.

30804.Name: Force Recon Scout Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Force Recon Scout
30804.Desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
These walking Landcruisers with bipedal structures are often used as "scouts," for they are able to quickly traverse rough terrain and reach key positions to seize the initiative for their allies. Equipped with Force Recon armaments, this Landcruiser can not only serve as a forward scout for the main force, but can also exploit openings and actively attack the enemy where their lines are weakest, thus playing a similar role to that of traditional cavalry...

30805.Name: Force Recon Ground Effect Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Force Recon Ground Effect
30805.Desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
The ground effect Landcruiser is able to "fly" a certain distance above ground by maintaining lift and generating pressure differentials through firing high-speed jet sprays at the surface, allowing it to more economically achieve combat cruising speed, avoid mines and traps, and perform highly effective assaults. However, costs and limits on operation time mean that mass-produced models carry limited payloads. As such, they are currently limited to Force Recon roles...

30851.Name: Cutting Edge All-Purpose Storm Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Cutting Edge All-Purpose Storm
30851.Desc:
Balancing cutting-edge tech, production costs, and sortie rates, these elite Landcruisers confer immense penetrative power upon any order of battle, and are the key fulcrum of the frontline.
The all-purpose storm combat package combines multi-barrel automatic guns with close-quarter rotating blades, allowing this Landcruiser to battle opponents at any range, while heavy howitzers on both arms allow it to obliterate cover and deny defenders the benefit of their fortifications. According to combat doctrine co-authored by the Fatui and the Royal Military Academy, these Landcruisers must be supported by all nearby units when they attack, speedily punching a hole in enemy lines, which will allow for follow-up attacks in depth that will then cause the enemy defenses to collapse completely.

30852.Name: Cutting Edge All-Purpose Scout Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Cutting Edge All-Purpose Scout
30852.Desc:
Balancing cutting-edge tech, production costs, and sortie rates, these elite Landcruisers confer immense penetrative power upon any order of battle, and are the key fulcrum of the frontline.
The all-purpose scout combat package is designed for both long- and short-range combat, and not only leads scout Landcruiser squads, but also provides close support for All-Purpose Storm Landcruisers during high-intensity battles, such as crossing specialized anti-Landcruiser trenches, or destroying enemy strongpoints. This Landcruiser type can also keep up with the tip of the spear as it breaks through in depth, before swinging out to the wings and swiftly attacking key targets in the enemy's rear lines.

30853.Name: Cutting Edge Fire Support Ground Effect Landcruiser
Title: Landcruiser
Cutting Edge Fire Support Ground Effect
30853.Desc:
Balancing cutting-edge tech, production costs, and sortie rates, these elite Landcruisers confer immense penetrative power upon any order of battle, and are the key fulcrum of the frontline.
After being equipped with high-efficiency jet engines, this Ground Effect Landcruiser has gained the ability to carry multiple armaments, allowing it to deliver this sizable firepower anywhere on the battlefield in a timely fashion. As such, the combat doctrine co-authored by the Fatui and the Royal Military Academy states that they are to be organized as a "Quick Reaction Force" in large-scale battles, meant to guard against enemy breakthroughs or counterattacks, and to press the advantage if the battle is going favorably. Of course, all such Landcruisers have the ability to operate independently, and on long tours of duty, they can form the core of a small squad and thus maximize the firepower of various Fatui unit types...

616260.Name: Crab Tsar
Title: Lord of the Palace
616260.Desc: Its mind infected by ancient moonlight, this ruler of crabs was plunged for a time into delirium and madness. But just as it was about to unleash its might, it suffered a crushing defeat at the hands of a thief who broke into its court, rendering it more agreeable. Even so, this crustacean suzerain yet yearns to clash pincers with strong foes, longing to triumph over opponents worthy of its full might.

61626.Name: Battle-Scarred Rock Crab
Title: Fighting Spirit, Driven by Regret
61626.Desc: Its mind infected by ancient moonlight, this ruler of crabs was plunged for a time into delirium and madness. But just as it was about to unleash its might, it suffered a crushing defeat at the hands of a thief who broke into its court, rendering it more agreeable. Even so, this crustacean suzerain yet yearns to clash pincers with strong foes, longing to triumph over opponents worthy of its full might.

63001.Name: Radiant Antelope
Title: Radiant Beast
Antelope
63001.Desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
Strange lightning once fell upon the land blessed by moonlight, causing once ordinary antelopes to gain the power to wield lightning. They say that some have seen a truly strange sight — antelopes standing on cliffs at the convergence of a storm, attracting bolts of lightning to temper their bodies.

63002.Name: Radiant Bladehorn
Title: Radiant Beast
Bladehorn
63002.Desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
It is said that in the ancient past, when these borderlands were still shrouded by the pitch-dark shadow, only the charging of the giant rhinos could return the power that makes all things turn... And this was all that was asked of them in return for the moonlight shining down its blessings.

63003.Name: Radiant Lunapod
Title: Radiant Beast
Lunapod
63003.Desc:
A beast that has undergone a unique evolution due to age-long immersion in the ancient moon's power.
Legend has it that when the waves of calamity rolled over the land, even those animals who dwelled in the Forsaken Sea were not spared. Those who could not accept the moonlight into themselves vanished like foam, whether great sea serpents who could send waves skyward, or single-eyed monsters who once plotted to consume all things.

63011.Name: Radiant Moonfly
Title: Shifting Shadow Beneath the Moon
Radiant Moonfly
63011.Desc:
The moon's ancient power has seeped into these illusory wings, and the butterfly-shaped monster now dances lightly in the moonlight.
The principles of evolution state that after the wild yet primeval power was tamed by the heavenly ruler, such a monster should not be able to maintain its shape, becoming smaller and weaker over time. However, the moon's blessing has allowed it to glide through this world while remaining in its prime, displaying the remnants of an older world, when the ancient moon once illuminated the land.

24030305.Name: Aeonblight Drake: Annihilation Configuration
Title: Perpetual Motion GL-Faf
24030305.Desc:
This dragon-shaped combat machine is a being that inspires fear, much like the lord who once ruled these vast lands.
This mysterious, tireless mechanical monstrosity seems to be proof that the now-destroyed realm had reached heights that mortals should never have.
Due to sustained corruption from the disordered Ley Lines, its frame has been enhanced, and it has adapted to its mission of annihilation so well that it has become a nightmare of death on the battlefield...

26162605.Name: Battle-Scarred Rock Crab: One Million Blasts
Title: Fighting Spirit, Driven by Regret
26162605.Desc:
A crab that lives within shells and conches. A distant relation to the Fontainian Armored Crab. Most specimens are docile and gentle, but there are stories of crabs fighting to the death to defend their territory — their gentle nature transforming to fuel a wild, frenzied rage.
Among the twisted illusions of the Ley Lines, the mighty Rock Crab warrior who fell to a horde of foes has reforged its offensive abilities to withstand the onslaught of a hundred thousand enemies — an endeavor rewarded with alarming success...

23079405.Name: Battle-Hardened Fireblade Shock Trooper: Forlorn Hope
Title: Molten Iron, Thundering Edge
23079405.Desc:
An elite officer of the Fatui Oprichniki who specializes in close combat using a giant blade.
Whether it be in the war against the dark calamity or against those ignoramuses who dare stand against the Tsaritsa's ideals, those who breach at the tip of the spear suffer the greatest casualties. Those who survive a hundred battles only to fall all the same become a fearful memory in the Ley Lines. Due to sustained immersion in the twisted currents, these warriors' lingering shades turn the blades they once wielded in desperate battle against the challenger who seeks to quell the disorder....

810.Name: Frostnight Herra
Title: Guardian of the Holy Light
Frostnight Herra
810.Desc:
Proud beings that roam in the waning glow of the moon, wielding ancient powers long since tamed by the Lord of the Sky.
Legend says these graceful and mystical beasts were born in the age before the Frost Moon shattered, and, favored by the divine emissary, they would not be tainted by the skylight. Even now, among the followers of the Frost Moon, they are regarded as sacred beasts lost to this world, retreating along secret lunar paths beyond the reach of mortal eyes. Yet, as they have for countless centuries past, they still wander in the shadows of the moon, treading the boundary between two worlds, guarding the lands coveted by calamity, and watching over those who dwell within them — for this is the very oath they first swore to the apostle of the golden city.

20081101.Name: Frostnight Herra: Hatred and Rage
Title: Guardian of the Holy Light
20081101.Desc: A majestic being that strides with pride through the frost-laden night, wielding ancient powers long since tamed by the Lord of the Sky. Yet under the unspeakable influence of the Ley Lines, its solemn nobility has been usurped by a ferocious appetite for prey and a willingness to meet intruders with the freezing edge of a blade...

22132005.Name: Battle-Hardened Lightkeeper: Mourning Echoes
Title: The Eternal Hunter
22132005.Desc: A valiant warrior who resisted the dark calamity in ancient days. Though his life's spark has been extinguished, his unbending will has yet to fade, and those who swore to become hunters of the Wild Hunt continue his endless battle even today. Twisted by the chaotic Ley Lines, any intruders who enter his sight are treated no differently than the fiercest abominations of the Wild Hunt and are faced with the full force of his determination and strength...

23060503.Name: Veteran Frost Operative: Bloodsoaked Blade
Title: Shadowy Icicle
23060503.Desc:
An elite agent of the Fatui. Selected from childhood, she rose to the top after long years of rigorous training — an experience which instilled in her extraordinary skill and unswerving loyalty.
Regrettably, in the perilous chaos of the Ley Lines, her sense of reason has long since been swallowed by a lust for battle — one that leads her to mercilessly hunt down intruders and subject them to an onslaught of pure rage...
